name: Carr0
description:
Currently in development at test stage, with hopes to be one finished small fun game. 

A truck driver who delivers cargo in a small countryside, just making his own part to make the economy flow.

Leave a comment about your experience playing and how i can improve (or fix) the game! I also love hearing new features ideas! 

Feel free to send me an email or dm on Twitter if you don't want to post here.
